<![CDATA[
/* Ø¥Ø®ÙØ§Ø¡ Ø±Ø§Ø¨Ø· Ø§Ù„ØµÙØ­Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø±Ø¦ÙŠØ³ÙŠØ© Ø£Ø³ÙÙ„ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ù‚Ø§Ù„Ø§Øª */
a.home-link {
  display: none !important;
}

/* Ø¥Ø®ÙØ§Ø¡ Ø±Ø§Ø¨Ø· Ø§Ù„Ø§Ø´ØªØ±Ø§Ùƒ (Atom) */
.feed-links {
  display: none !important;
}
.gsc-input input {
  width: 100% !important;   /* Ø¹Ø±Ø¶ Ø§Ù„Ø­Ù‚Ù„ */
  height: 40px;             /* Ø§Ø±ØªÙØ§Ø¹ Ø§Ù„Ø­Ù‚Ù„ */
  font-size: 18px;          /* Ø­Ø¬Ù… Ø§Ù„Ù†Øµ Ø¯Ø§Ø®Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ø­Ù‚Ù„ (40px ÙƒØ§Ù† Ø¶Ø®Ù… Ø¬Ø¯Ø§Ù‹) */
}

/* Ø²Ø± Ø§Ø¨Ø­Ø« Ù…Ø«Ù„ nav-btn */
.gsc-search-button input {
  padding: 20px 30px;
  border-radius: 12px;
  border: 6px solid #8a7d6c;
  background: #2D2F33; /* Ø±Ù…Ø§Ø¯ÙŠ Ù…Ø²Ø±Ù‚ ØºØ§Ù…Ù‚ */
  color: #fff;
  font-weight: bold;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  box-shadow:
    -8px -8px 16px rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.1),
     8px  8px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6),
    inset -3px -3px 6px rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.08),
    inset  3px  3px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

/* hover */
.gsc-search-button input:hover {
  background: var(--dark-cold);
  transform: translateY(-3px);
}

/* active */
.gsc-search-button input:active {
  background: var(--charcoal);
}

/* Ø¥Ø¶Ø§ÙØ© Ù…Ø³Ø§ÙØ© Ù…Ù† Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø¹Ù„Ù‰ Ù„Ù„Ù‡ÙŠØ¯Ø± */
#header, #header-inner {
  margin-top: 20px;
  padding-top: 10px;
}

/* ğŸ¯ Ø£Ù„ÙˆØ§Ù† */
:root {
  --dark-bg: #2A2A2A;
  --dark-gray: #2D2F33;
  --dark-cold: #3A3D41;
  --charcoal: #333333;
  --text-color: #fff;

  /* ğŸ†• Ø§Ù„Ù†ØµÙˆØµ ÙˆØ§Ù„Ø±ÙˆØ§Ø¨Ø· */
  --text-main: #ffffff;        /* Ø§Ù„Ù†Øµ Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø§Ø¯ÙŠ */
  --text-muted: #aaaaaa;       /* Ø§Ù„Ù†ØµÙˆØµ Ø§Ù„Ø«Ø§Ù†ÙˆÙŠØ© */
  --text-link: #1e88e5;        /* Ù„ÙˆÙ† Ø§Ù„Ø±Ø§Ø¨Ø· */
  --text-link-hover: #64b5f6;  /* Ø¹Ù†Ø¯ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø±ÙˆØ± */
  --text-link-visited: #1565c0;/* Ø¨Ø¹Ø¯ Ø§Ù„Ø²ÙŠØ§Ø±Ø© */

  /* ğŸ†• Ø§Ù„Ø®Ø·ÙˆØ· */
  --font-family: "Tajawal", sans-serif;
  --font-size-body: 24px;
  --font-size-title: 40px;
  --font-size-subtitle: 24px;
}

/* ğŸ“Š Ù…ØªØºÙŠØ±Ø§Øª Ø§Ù„ØªØ­ÙƒÙ… */
:root {
  /* Ø®Ù„ÙÙŠØ© Ø§Ù„ØµÙˆØ±Ø© */
  --bg-image-opacity: 100%;
  --bg-image-size-width: 100%;
  --bg-image-size-height: 100%;
  --bg-image-position-x: center;
  --bg-image-position-y: center;
  
  /* Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø³Ø§Ø­Ø§Øª */
  --body-margin: 2%;
  --body-padding: 0;
  --body-min-height: 100vh;
  
  /* Ø§Ù„Ø­Ø¯ÙˆØ¯ ÙˆØ§Ù„Ø¸Ù„Ø§Ù„ */
  --border-width: 15px;
  --border-radius: 20px;
  --shadow-intensity: 1;
  
  /* Ø§Ù„Ø­Ø§ÙˆÙŠØ§Øª */
  --container-max-width: 95%;
  --frame-box-margin: 15px;
  --frame-box-padding: 20px;
  --frame-box-border-radius: 16px;
  
  /* Ø§Ù„Ù†Ø§Ù Ø¨Ø§Ø± */
  --nav-gap: 15px;
  --nav-btn-padding: 10px 20px;
  --nav-btn-border-radius: 16px;
  
  /* Ø§Ù„Ø£ÙŠÙ‚ÙˆÙ†Ø§Øª */
  --social-icon-size: 40px;
  --social-icon-padding: 6px;
}

/* âœ¨ Ø¥Ø·Ø§Ø± Ø¹Ø§Ù… Ù„Ù„Ø£Ù‚Ø³Ø§Ù… */
.frame-box {
  border: 15px solid #8a7d6c;
  border-radius: var(--frame-box-border-radius);
  background: var(--dark-gray);
  box-shadow:
    -8px -8px 16px rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.1),
     8px  8px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6),
    inset -3px -3px 6px rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.08),
    inset  3px  3px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  margin: var(--frame-box-margin) 0;
  padding: var(--frame-box-padding);
}

/* ===== Ø§Ù„ØµÙØ­Ø© ===== */
body {
  margin: var(--body-margin); 
  padding: var(--body-padding);
  min-height: var(--body-min-height);
  font-family: var(--font-family);
  font-size: var(--font-size-body);
  line-height: 1.8;
  background: var(--dark-bg) url("https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/pw/AP1GczOJAPs3IGUWaeNnC5XQYIM2Z5RaAwRbVpTSv32C2PqYGJalpG3GQ3Ji_3FevJutmL_QlRBxdFajSBZiFmGRIViJS1IP6vLiMXJKklQZojtQFHN3vPsrso3jH9DXl7O5K0PAvihifVnwORCbGl6sosI=w919-h919-s-no-gm?authuser=0") 
              no-repeat var(--bg-image-position-x) var(--bg-image-position-y) fixed;
  background-size: var(--bg-image-size-width) var(--bg-image-size-height);
  color: var(--text-main);

  border: var(--border-width) solid #8a7d6c;
  border-radius: var(--border-radius);
  box-shadow:
    calc(-25px * var(--shadow-intensity)) calc(-25px * var(--shadow-intensity)) calc(50px * var(--shadow-intensity)) rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.2),
     calc(25px * var(--shadow-intensity))  calc(25px * var(--shadow-intensity)) calc(50px * var(--shadow-intensity)) rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.9),
    calc(-15px * var(--shadow-intensity)) calc(-15px * var(--shadow-intensity)) calc(30px * var(--shadow-intensity)) rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.15),
     calc(15px * var(--shadow-intensity))  calc(15px * var(--shadow-intensity)) calc(30px * var(--shadow-intensity)) rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8),
    inset calc(-8px * var(--shadow-intensity)) calc(-8px * var(--shadow-intensity)) calc(16px * var(--shadow-intensity)) rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.1),
    inset  calc(8px * var(--shadow-intensity))  calc(8px * var(--shadow-intensity)) calc(16px * var(--shadow-intensity)) rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8),
    0 0 0 calc(6px * var(--shadow-intensity)) rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15),
    0 0 0 calc(12px * var(--shadow-intensity)) rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);
}

.container { 
  max-width: var(--container-max-width); 
  width: 100%; 
  margin: auto; 
}

/* ===== Ø§Ù„Ù†ØµÙˆØµ ÙˆØ§Ù„Ø¹Ù†Ø§ÙˆÙŠÙ† ===== */
h1, .post-title {
  font-size: var(--font-size-title);
  font-weight: bold;
  color: var(--text-main);
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}
h2, h3 {
  font-size: var(--font-size-subtitle);
  font-weight: bold;
  color: var(--text-main);
}

.post-meta, .post-author, .post-date, .post-labels {
  color: var(--text-muted);
  font-size: 13px;
}

/* ===== Ø§Ù„Ø±ÙˆØ§Ø¨Ø· ===== */
a {
  color: var(--text-link);
  text-decoration: none;
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}
a:hover {
  color: var(--text-link-hover);
  text-decoration: underline;
}
a:visited {
  color: var(--text-link-visited);
}

/* ===== Ø§Ù„Ù†Ø§Ù Ø¨Ø§Ø± ===== */
nav {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
}
nav ul {
  display: flex;
  gap: var(--nav-gap);
  list-style: none;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}
.nav-btn {
  padding: 10px 20px;
  border-radius: 12px;
  border: 6px solid #8a7d6c;
  background: #2D2F33; /* Ø±Ù…Ø§Ø¯ÙŠ Ù…Ø²Ø±Ù‚ ØºØ§Ù…Ù‚ */
  color: #fff;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-weight: bold;
  display: inline-block;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  box-shadow:
    -8px -8px 16px rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.1),
     8px  8px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6),
    inset -3px -3px 6px rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.08),
    inset  3px  3px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}
.nav-btn:hover {
  background: var(--dark-cold);
  transform: translateY(-3px);
}
.nav-btn.active {
  background: var(--charcoal);
}

/* ===== Ø£ÙŠÙ‚ÙˆÙ†Ø§Øª Ø§Ù„ØªÙˆØ§ØµÙ„ ===== */
.menu-right {
  display: flex;
  gap: 10px;
}
.menu-right .social-icon img {
  width: 50px;
  height: 50px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  background: #2D2F33;
  padding: 8px;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  box-shadow:
    -6px -6px 12px rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.1),
     6px  6px 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6),
    inset -2px -2px 4px rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.08),
    inset  2px  2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}
.menu-right .social-icon img:hover {
  transform: scale(1.1);
  background: var(--dark-cold);
}

/* ===== Ø§Ù„ÙÙˆØªØ± 2 (3 Ø£Ø¹Ù…Ø¯Ø©) ===== */
.footer2 {
  display: flex;
  gap: 15px;
  margin-top: 15px;
}
.footer2 > div {
  flex: 1;
}
body {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  background: #222;
}

.game-container {
  width: 70vw;
  height: 500px;
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
  background: #70c5ce;
  max-width: 800px;
  min-width: 400px;
  border-radius: 10px;
  box-shadow: 0 8px 32px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
}

.sky {
  background-image: url('https://drive.google.com/uc?export=download&id=19HU_H8ZbAIOFpi2ptcuEKWuQWsxhymqq');
  width: 100%;
  height: 420px;
  position: absolute;
  background-size: cover;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
}

.ground {
  background-image: url('https://drive.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1sQLyC8J13NcM-YWDHWd2r4gRH1mSuoV-');
  width: 100%;
  height: 80px;
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 0;
  z-index: 2;
  background-repeat: repeat-x;
  background-size: auto 100%;
}

.bird {
  background-image: url('https://drive.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1-dsg4kx6VBcJYnz2QUTio6WPbPnlmois');
  position: absolute;
  width: 50px;
  height: 40px;
  left: 150px;
  bottom: 250px;
  background-size: contain;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  z-index: 3;
}

.obstacle, .topObstacle {
  background-image: url('https://drive.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1C6gFsU0l4n4svmntQy38iZc_4gFOvUlH');
  width: 70px;
  position: absolute;
  background-size: 70px 100%;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
}
.topObstacle { transform: rotate(180deg); }

.score-board {
  position: absolute;
  top: 10px;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translateX(-50%);
  font-size: 24px;
  font-weight: bold;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 3px black;
  z-index: 5;
}

.overlay {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  flex-direction: column;
  position: absolute;
  top: 0; left: 0;
  width: 100%; height: 100%;
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.6);
  color: white;
  font-size: 24px;
  font-weight: bold;
  z-index: 10;
  text-align: center;
}


/* ===== Ø§Ø³ØªØ¬Ø§Ø¨Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø§Ø´Ø§Øª Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø®ØªÙ„ÙØ© ===== */
@media (max-width: 1200px) {
  .container {
    max-width: 98%;
  }
  
  .frame-box {
    margin: 12px 0;
    padding: 18px;
  }
  
  .nav-btn {
    padding: 8px 16px;
    font-size: 14px;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  body {
    margin: 1%;
    font-size: 20px;
  }
  
  .container {
    max-width: 99%;
  }
  
  .frame-box {
    margin: 10px 0;
    padding: 15px;
    border-radius: 12px;
  }
  
  nav ul {
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    gap: 10px;
  }
  
  .nav-btn {
    padding: 8px 15px;
    font-size: 14px;
    margin: 2px;
  }
  
  .menu-right {
    gap: 8px;
  }
  
  .social-icon img {
    width: 40px;
    height: 40px;
  }
  
  .footer2 {
    flex-direction: column;
    gap: 10px;
  }
  
  .footer2 > div {
    margin-bottom: 10px;
  }
  
  h1, .post-title {
    font-size: 32px;
  }
  
  h2, h3 {
    font-size: 20px;
  }
  
  /* Ù„Ø¹Ø¨Ø© Flappy Bird Ù„Ù„Ø´Ø§Ø´Ø§Øª Ø§Ù„Ù…ØªÙˆØ³Ø·Ø© */
  .game-container {
    height: 400px;
    max-width: 350px;
  }
  
  .sky {
    height: 320px;
  }
  
  .score-board {
    font-size: 20px;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
  body {
    margin: 0.5%;
    font-size: 18px;
  }
  
  .container {
    max-width: 100%;
  }
  
  .frame-box {
    margin: 8px 0;
    padding: 12px;
    border-radius: 10px;
  }
  
  nav {
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: stretch;
    gap: 10px;
  }
  
  nav ul {
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 8px;
  }
  
  .nav-btn {
    padding: 6px 12px;
    font-size: 12px;
    margin: 1px;
  }
  
  .menu-right {
    justify-content: center;
    margin-top: 10px;
  }
  
  .social-icon img {
    width: 35px;
    height: 35px;
    padding: 6px;
  }
  
  h1, .post-title {
    font-size: 28px;
  }
  
  h2, h3 {
    font-size: 18px;
  }
  
  /* Ù„Ø¹Ø¨Ø© Flappy Bird Ù„Ù„Ø´Ø§Ø´Ø§Øª Ø§Ù„ØµØºÙŠØ±Ø© */
  .game-container {
    height: 350px;
    max-width: 300px;
  }
  
  .sky {
    height: 270px;
  }
  
  .score-board {
    font-size: 18px;
    padding: 6px 12px;
  }
  
  .bird {
    width: 35px;
    height: 35px;
  }
  
  .overlay div {
    font-size: 20px;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 320px) {
  body {
    font-size: 16px;
  }
  
  .nav-btn {
    padding: 5px 10px;
    font-size: 11px;
  }
  
  .social-icon img {
    width: 30px;
    height: 30px;
  }
  
  h1, .post-title {
    font-size: 24px;
  }
  
  h2, h3 {
    font-size: 16px;
  }
}

/* ===== ØªØ­Ø³ÙŠÙ†Ø§Øª Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø¯Ø§Ø¡ ===== */
.frame-box {
  will-change: transform;
  backface-visibility: hidden;
  transform: translateZ(0);
}

.nav-btn, .social-icon img {
  will-change: transform;
  transition: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
  transform: translateZ(0);
}

/* ØªØ­Ø³ÙŠÙ† ØªØ­Ù…ÙŠÙ„ Ø§Ù„ØµÙˆØ± */
img {
  loading: lazy;
  decoding: async;
}

/* ØªØ­Ø³ÙŠÙ† Ø§Ù„Ø®Ø·ÙˆØ· */
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Tajawal:wght@200;300;400;500;700;800;900&display=swap');

/* ØªØ­Ø³ÙŠÙ† Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø¯Ø§Ø¡ Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø§Ù… */
* {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

body {
  font-display: swap;
}

/* ØªØ­Ø³ÙŠÙ† Ø§Ù„ØªÙ…Ø±ÙŠØ± */
html {
  scroll-behavior: smooth;
}

/* ØªØ­Ø³ÙŠÙ† Ø§Ù„Ø°Ø§ÙƒØ±Ø© */
.game-container, .tradingview-widget-container {
  contain: layout style paint;
}

/* ===== ØªØ­Ø³ÙŠÙ†Ø§Øª Ø§Ù„ÙˆØµÙˆÙ„ÙŠØ© ===== */
.nav-btn:focus, .social-icon:focus {
  outline: 2px solid #1e88e5;
  outline-offset: 2px;
}

/* ===== ØªØ­Ø³ÙŠÙ†Ø§Øª Ø¥Ø¶Ø§ÙÙŠØ© ===== */
.post-title {
  line-height: 1.3;
  margin-bottom: 15px;
}

.post-meta, .post-author, .post-date, .post-labels {
  font-size: 14px;
  line-height: 1.5;
}

/* ØªØ­Ø³ÙŠÙ† Ø¹Ø±Ø¶ Ø§Ù„Ù†ØµÙˆØµ */
.post-body {
  line-height: 1.8;
  word-spacing: 1px;
}

/* ØªØ­Ø³ÙŠÙ† Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø²Ø±Ø§Ø± */
.overlay button {
  min-height: 44px;
  min-width: 44px;
}

/* ===== ØªØ­Ø³ÙŠÙ†Ø§Øª Ø¥Ø¶Ø§ÙÙŠØ© Ù…ØªÙ‚Ø¯Ù…Ø© ===== */

/* ØªØ­Ø³ÙŠÙ† Ø§Ù„ØªØ¨Ø§ÙŠÙ† ÙˆØ§Ù„Ù†Ù‚Ø§Ø¡ */
.post-title {
  text-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
}

/* ØªØ­Ø³ÙŠÙ† Ø§Ù„Ù†ØµÙˆØµ */
.post-body {
  text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
}

/* ØªØ­Ø³ÙŠÙ† Ø§Ù„Ø±ÙˆØ§Ø¨Ø· */
a {
  text-decoration-skip-ink: auto;
}

/* ØªØ­Ø³ÙŠÙ† Ø§Ù„Ù†Ù…Ø§Ø°Ø¬ */
input, textarea, select {
  font-family: inherit;
  font-size: inherit;
}

/* ØªØ­Ø³ÙŠÙ† Ø§Ù„Ø¬Ø¯Ø§ÙˆÙ„ */
table {
  border-collapse: collapse;
  width: 100%;
}

/* ØªØ­Ø³ÙŠÙ† Ø§Ù„Ù‚ÙˆØ§Ø¦Ù… */
ul, ol {
  padding-left: 1.5em;
}

/* ØªØ­Ø³ÙŠÙ† Ø§Ù„ÙƒÙˆØ¯ */
code, pre {
  font-family: 'Courier New', monospace;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  padding: 2px 4px;
  border-radius: 3px;
}

/* ØªØ­Ø³ÙŠÙ† Ø§Ù„Ø§Ù‚ØªØ¨Ø§Ø³Ø§Øª */
blockquote {
  border-left: 4px solid var(--text-link);
  padding-left: 20px;
  margin: 20px 0;
  font-style: italic;
  color: var(--text-muted);
}

/* ØªØ­Ø³ÙŠÙ† Ø§Ù„ØµÙˆØ± */
.post-body img {
  max-width: 100%;
  height: auto;
  border-radius: 8px;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
}

/* ØªØ­Ø³ÙŠÙ† Ø§Ù„ÙÙŠØ¯ÙŠÙˆ */
.post-body video, .post-body iframe {
  max-width: 100%;
  border-radius: 8px;
}

/* ØªØ­Ø³ÙŠÙ† Ø§Ù„Ø£Ù„ÙˆØ§Ù† Ù„Ù„Ù…Ø­ØªÙˆÙ‰ */
.post-body a {
  color: var(--text-link);
  border-bottom: 1px solid transparent;
  transition: border-bottom-color 0.3s ease;
}

.post-body a:hover {
  border-bottom-color: var(--text-link);
}

/* ØªØ­Ø³ÙŠÙ† Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ù†Ø§ÙˆÙŠÙ† Ø§Ù„ÙØ±Ø¹ÙŠØ© */
h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 {
  margin-top: 30px;
  margin-bottom: 15px;
}

h1:first-child, h2:first-child, h3:first-child {
  margin-top: 0;
}

/* ØªØ­Ø³ÙŠÙ† Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø³Ø§ÙØ§Øª */
.post-body p {
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.post-body p:last-child {
  margin-bottom: 0;
}

/* ØªØ­Ø³ÙŠÙ† Ø§Ù„Ù‚ÙˆØ§Ø¦Ù… ÙÙŠ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø­ØªÙˆÙ‰ */
.post-body ul, .post-body ol {
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.post-body li {
  margin-bottom: 8px;
}

/* ØªØ­Ø³ÙŠÙ† Ø§Ù„Ø¬Ø¯Ø§ÙˆÙ„ ÙÙŠ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø­ØªÙˆÙ‰ */
.post-body table {
  margin: 20px 0;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
  border-radius: 8px;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.post-body th, .post-body td {
  padding: 12px 15px;
  text-align: right;
  border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
}

.post-body th {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  font-weight: bold;
}

/* ØªØ­Ø³ÙŠÙ† Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø²Ø±Ø§Ø± ÙÙŠ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø­ØªÙˆÙ‰ */
.post-body .button, .post-body button {
  background: var(--text-link);
  color: white;
  padding: 10px 20px;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 6px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: background 0.3s ease;
}

.post-body .button:hover, .post-body button:hover {
  background: var(--text-link-hover);
}

/* ØªØ­Ø³ÙŠÙ† Ø§Ù„ØªÙ†Ø¨ÙŠÙ‡Ø§Øª */
.alert, .notice {
  padding: 15px 20px;
  margin: 20px 0;
  border-radius: 6px;
  border-left: 4px solid;
}

.alert-success, .notice-success {
  background: rgba(76, 175, 80, 0.1);
  border-left-color: #4caf50;
  color: #4caf50;
}

.alert-warning, .notice-warning {
  background: rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.1);
  border-left-color: #ffc107;
  color: #ffc107;
}

.alert-error, .notice-error {
  background: rgba(244, 67, 54, 0.1);
  border-left-color: #f44336;
  color: #f44336;
}

.alert-info, .notice-info {
  background: rgba(33, 150, 243, 0.1);
  border-left-color: #2196f3;
  color: #2196f3;
}

/* ===== Ù„Ø¹Ø¨Ø© Flappy Bird ===== */
.game-container {
  width: 70vw;
  height: 500px;
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
  background: #70c5ce;
  max-width: 800px;
  min-width: 400px;
  border-radius: 10px;
  box-shadow: 0 8px 32px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

/* ØªØ­Ø³ÙŠÙ† Ø§Ù„Ø§Ø³ØªØ¬Ø§Ø¨Ø© Ù„Ù„Ø£Ø¬Ù‡Ø²Ø© Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø®ØªÙ„ÙØ© */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .game-container {
    width: 90vw;
    height: 400px;
    min-width: 300px;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
  .game-container {
    width: 95vw;
    height: 350px;
    min-width: 280px;
  }
}

.sky {
  background-image: url('https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=1YOUR_BACKGROUND_IMAGE_ID');
  width: 100%;
  height: 420px;
  position: absolute;
  background-size: cover;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

/* ØªØ­Ø³ÙŠÙ† Ø§Ù„Ø§Ø³ØªØ¬Ø§Ø¨Ø© Ù„Ù„Ø³Ù…Ø§Ø¡ */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .sky {
    height: 320px;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
  .sky {
    height: 270px;
  }
}

.bird {
  background-image: url('https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=1YOUR_BIRD_IMAGE_ID');
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  position: absolute;
  background-size: cover;
  left: 150px;
  bottom: 250px;
  transition: all 0.1s ease;
  z-index: 10;
  animation: wingFlap 0.3s ease-in-out infinite;
}

@keyframes wingFlap {
  0%, 100% { transform: scaleY(1); }
  50% { transform: scaleY(0.8); }
}

.bird.jumping {
  animation: wingFlap 0.2s ease-in-out infinite, jumpRotate 0.1s ease-in-out;
}

@keyframes jumpRotate {
  from { transform: rotate(0deg); }
  to { transform: rotate(-15deg); }
}

/* ØªØ­Ø³ÙŠÙ† Ø§Ù„Ø§Ø³ØªØ¬Ø§Ø¨Ø© Ù„Ù„Ø·Ø§Ø¦Ø± */
@media (max-width: 480px) {

    height: 35px;
  }
}

.obstacle, .topObstacle {

  min-width: 70px !important;
  max-width: 70px !important;
  height: auto;
  position: absolute;
  background-size: 70px 100% !important;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-position: center;
  image-rendering: pixelated;
  image-rendering: -moz-crisp-edges;
  image-rendering: crisp-edges;
  box-sizing: border-box !important;
  padding: 0 !important;
  margin: 0 !important;
  border: none !important;
}

.topObstacle {
  transform: rotate(180deg);
}

.ground {
  background-image: url('https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=1YOUR_GROUND_IMAGE_ID');
  width: 100%;
  height: 80px;
  position: absolute;
  top: auto;
  bottom: 0;
  z-index: 2;
  background-repeat: repeat-x;
  background-size: auto 100%;
}

.ground.moving {
  width: 200%;
  animation: slideright 2s infinite linear;
}

@keyframes slideright {
  0% { transform: translateX(0); }
  100% { transform: translateX(-50%); }
}

.ground-container {
  height: 80px;
  width: 100%;
  left: 0;
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 0;
}

.score-board {
  position: absolute;
  top: 20px;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translateX(-50%);
  color: white;
  font-size: 24px;
  font-weight: bold;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  z-index: 10;
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  padding: 8px 16px;
  border-radius: 8px;
}

/* ØªØ­Ø³ÙŠÙ† Ø§Ù„Ø§Ø³ØªØ¬Ø§Ø¨Ø© Ù„Ù„Ù†Ù‚Ø§Ø· */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .score-board {
    font-size: 20px;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
  .score-board {
    font-size: 18px;
    padding: 6px 12px;
  }
}

.overlay {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.8);
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  z-index: 20;
}

.overlay div {
  color: white;
  font-size: 24px;
  font-weight: bold;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  text-align: center;
}

.overlay button {
  background: var(--text-link);
  color: white;
  border: none;
  padding: 12px 24px;
  margin: 8px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 16px;
  font-weight: bold;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  min-height: 44px;
  min-width: 44px;
}

.overlay button:hover {
  background: var(--text-link-hover);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

.overlay button:active {
  transform: translateY(0);
}

.best-score {
  color: #ffd700;
  font-size: 18px;
  margin-bottom: 15px;
}

.secondary-btn {
  background: #666 !important;
}

.secondary-btn:hover {
  background: #888 !important;
}

.settings-container {
  margin: 20px 0;
}

.setting-label {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  margin: 15px 0;
  color: white;
  font-size: 16px;
}

.slider {
  width: 100px;
  margin-left: 15px;
}

.checkbox {
  margin-left: 15px;
  transform: scale(1.2);
}

/* ØªØ­Ø³ÙŠÙ† Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø²Ø±Ø§Ø± */
#restartGameBtn {
  width: 100% !important;
  height: 300px !important;
  font-size: 24px !important;
  padding: 20px !important;
  display: flex !important;
  align-items: center !important;
  justify-content: center !important;
  flex-direction: column !important;
}

/* Ù„Ù„Ø´Ø§Ø´Ø§Øª Ø§Ù„ØµØºÙŠØ±Ø© */
@media (max-width: 480px) {
  #restartGameBtn {
    height: 200px !important;
    font-size: 20px !important;
    padding: 15px !important;
  }
}

/* ØªØ£Ø«ÙŠØ± Ø§Ù„Ù†Ù‚Ø§Ø· */
.score-effect {
  position: absolute;
  color: #ffd700;
  font-size: 24px;
  font-weight: bold;
  pointer-events: none;
  z-index: 15;
  animation: scorePop 0.6s ease-out forwards;
}

@keyframes scorePop {
  0% {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: scale(1) translateY(0);
  }
  100% {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: scale(1.5) translateY(-30px);
  }
}
